channel.title: Pest Control!
channel.description:
In my Own Server I have Pest Control And its working but when a player finish it the don't get any points.... and in barrows when i dig in the hill nothing happen the char dosent go down
If Any One Can Help Me Pm ME

item.title: Pest Control!
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

for the pc you’d need to find a sendmessage or coords of when the minigame ends, and then just find what the boolean of the pc points is called.

i.e

if the name of the variable for the pc points was called public boolean pcPoints

you’d need to add this pcPoints+=1

the 1 stands for the ammount that’s given

well for the spade for barrows, you could make something like (not the best way, but possible.)

a boolean with the coords of the hill of barrows, in this case

[code]public boolean barrows() {

(coordinates for the hill of barrows)[/code] and then at your spade method you could add something like

[code]if(barrows())

heightlevel=-1 (the heightlevel is the boolean for the hights, it might be different looking on your server.

[/code]

I hope you get the idea on how to do it now.

This is an example, don’t just copy and paste what i wrote here.

  • this could be done much easier, but this is how did it. the booleans are actually unneeded but oh well.

Read full topic
